name: Opside
intro: A three-layer architecture for high-throughput Web3 applications
introduce: Opside is a three-tier blockchain architecture with the advantages of asset diversity and infinite scalability, providing a friendly operating environment for high-throughput Web3 applications. Opside introduces another three-tier architecture to the application. Its Layer 2 is a sidechain connected to Layer 1 via a bridge, and Layer 3 is a rollup running on Layer 2.
